passives.name: Dark Slash Extension
passives.desc:
Dark Slash use +1

When using Dark Slash:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

While Dark Knight active and HP at least 80% of MAX:
 â€¢ Dark Slash becomes Dark Slash+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%)
passives.short_desc: Dark Slash Extension: Boost to Dark Slash

passives.name: Dark Knight Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRVã€? ATK while Dark Knight active
passives.short_desc: Dark Knight Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRVã€? ATK

passives.name: Dark Bind Extension
passives.desc:
When using Dark Bind:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Slightly increases HP recovered based on HP damage dealt
 â€¢ HP recovered in excess of MAX HP shared with allies; recovery limit: 10% of MAX HP

While Dark Knight active and HP at least 50% of MAX:
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)

While Dark Knight active and HP at least 80% of MAX:
 â€¢ Dark Bind becomes Dark Bind+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%)
 â€¢ BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (slight BRV damage boost)
passives.short_desc: Dark Bind Extension: Boost to Dark Bind

passive.name: Dark Enchant Growth

passive.short_desc: Dark Enchant Growth: Boost to Dark Enchant

 â€¢ Slightly raises MAX BRVã€? ATK
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee  PG attack +  PF attack; slightly restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of own MAX HP) while Dark Knight active and HP at least 50% of MAX
 â€¢ HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage) while Dark Knight active and HP at least 80% of MAX
